actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A resolution referring S.1698 entitled "A bill for the relief of D.W. Jacobson, Ronald Karkala, and Paul Bjorgen of Gran Rapids, Minnesota" to the chief judge of the United States Court of Federal Claims for a report thereon.

summary.text: Refers S. 1698 (for the relief of three named individuals) to the chief judge of the U.S. Court of Federal Claims for review and a report.

titles.title: A resolution referring S.1698 entitled "A bill for the relief of D.W. Jacobson, Ronald Karkala, and Paul Bjorgen of Gran Rapids, Minnesota" to the chief judge of the United States Court of Federal Claims for a report thereon.
